actionable_tasks.title: Add Docker Optimization with Multi-Stage Builds
actionable_tasks.description: Implement Docker multi-stage builds for Node backend, React frontend, and MCP servers to reduce image size and improve caching, as listed in Medium Priority.
implementation_steps: Create multi-stage Dockerfile: builder stage for deps/build, runtime for app
Example: FROM node:20-alpine AS builder; COPY . .; RUN npm ci --only=prod; FROM node:20-alpine; COPY --from=builder /app/dist /app
Update docker-compose.yml for dev/prod; test build/push sizes
Document in README.md
